data.title: RFS: avant
data.text:
[Date Prev][Date Next] [Thread Prev][Thread Next] [Date Index] [Thread Index]

RFS: avant-window-navigator

To: debian-mentors@lists.debian.org

Subject: RFS: avant-window-navigator

From: Marco Rodrigues <gothicx@sapo.pt>

Date: Mon, 22 Oct 2007 19:16:58 +0100

Message-id: <[ðŸ”Ž] 471CE91A.5070801@sapo.pt>

Dear mentors, I am looking for a sponsor for my package "avant-window-navigator". * Package name : avant-window-navigator Version : 0.2-1 Upstream Author : Julien Lavergne <julien.lavergne@gmail.com> * URL : https://launchpad.net/avant-window-navigator * License : GPL v2 Section : gnome It builds these binary packages: avant-window-navigator - A MacOS X like panel for GNOME awn-manager - A manager for the preferences of avant-window-navigator libawn-dev - library for avant-window-navigator - developpement files libawn0 - library for avant-window-navigator python-libawn0 - library for avant-window-navigator - Python bindings The package appears to be lintian clean. The upload would fix these bugs: 428246 The package can be found on mentors.debian.net: - URL: http://mentors.debian.net/debian/pool/main/a/avant-window-navigator - Source repository: deb-src http://mentors.debian.net/debian unstable main contrib non-free - dget http://mentors.debian.net/debian/pool/main/a/avant-window-navigator/avant-window-navigator_0.2-1.dsc I would be glad if someone uploaded this package for me. Kind regards Marco Rodrigues

Reply to:

debian-mentors@lists.debian.org

Marco Rodrigues (on-list)

Marco Rodrigues (off-list)

Follow-Ups:

Re: RFS: avant-window-navigator

From: Michael Biebl <biebl@debian.org>
